newsitem.title: UK: UK to announce whether Royal Yacht to be replaced.
newsitem.headline: UK to announce whether Royal Yacht to be replaced.

text.p: The British government will announce later on Wednesday its decision on whether the Royal Yacht Britannia is to be replaced.
A Ministry of Defence spokeswoman said a statement will be made to parliament at 1530 gmt.
Britannia, which has been widely used by Queen Elizabeth when making state visits, is to be decommissioned towards the end of this year after 44 years afloat.

The sleek 6,000 tonne luxurious mini-liner costs about 10 million stg a year to run, but advocates of its replacement say it is a unique asset which has helped to secure two billion stg of exports for Britain over the past decade.
